text: get the packet from the post :city :relaxing
eat slowly and enjoy the meal
criticise other people from a first person view
the human brain does not understands the word 'not'
look for old stuff to sell on ebayclassifieds.com
Press tab to edit the text
Press tab twice to edit the start date
Press tab three times to edit 'Estimate' and guess the time in minutes it will take
Use arrow keys to select a day
Press del to remove a date
Press L to open an url inside the selected row in your browser
If it contains no url, the text is googled
Press 'arrow down' to focus the tree again
'Arrow left' collapses the selected row or navigates to the top
Or select anything from the right column - it will add text to the search bar
Keyboard user may prefer this way:
Press 'ctrl F' to focus the search bar
Type 't=t' to search for todos or 'c=r' for red colored items
The Quick links at the left are a representation of the whole database
I you click on a row there, that row is focused in the middle
Rightclick a row there to add a keyboard shortcut
Sort the rows by clicking on a header, e.g. 'Start date'
Since many entries are deeply nested, you may check 'Flatten view'
Combining 'Focus' and 'Flatten view' takes a while. We will fix this.
Edit a task so it contains repeat=1w and has a start date
You can also use 1d 1w 1m 1y for day, week month or year
If you complete it, its start date is increased by one week
The rows expanded states and the current selection are saved...
Not available tasks are grey and don't show up in the t=todo filter
When you complete a project, turn it into a note and move it to completed projects
Define a project by adding two notes below it:
check if 'Shantaram' is available at the library now
make a backup of my computer
Tasks like 'buy festival tickets' are not doable until the tickets are available
New rows will have the same type as their parent
Check the 'Edit structure' menu to see what is possible
Especially moving items around with w a s d is very useful
You can select several items by holding ctrl and clicking rows,
or by pressing shift + arrow keys
You can move or delete several items at once
You can rename a tag by rightclicking on it
Nest tags by concatenating them, e.g. :People:Mum
Every word starting with a colon will be listed in the Tag view at the right
When you edit a row and type colon M the accoding tag will be suggested
... between seaches and when you shutdown this program
Press space to toggle the task's type between note, todo and done
You can color a row red by pressing R
All available colors are listed in the 'Edit row' menu
Use tags for locations and people
You may use colors to mark what you want to do today
Use arrow keys to navigate. 'arrow right' expands the selected row
Don't write tasks in your calendar
A thing which needs more than one action to be completed, is a project
So add a Start date and check each day if something is starting
This way your mind remains free of loose ends
When you decide to do tasks, filter out all tasks which are not doable
e.g. the bookmark 'Doable tasks' hides tasks with tags or future start dates
Press P to toggle between note, sequential project, parallel project and paused project
In a parallel project, alls tasks are available
In a sequential project, only the top task is available
e.g. check the task above to make this one available
Tasks in a paused projects are not available
Multi-line entries are not available yet
Check the 'Current database' menu to discover shortcuts for undo and redo
If you enter a URL, you create a shared database
Press the button at the top with the blue arrow, to focus into the selected row
Then this view shows only the children of that row
At the top left is a list of all databases
Click on a database to show its contents
Rightclick to add a new database
That database is created locally and on the server. They will synchronize
Right now, many changes at once screw up the view.
Create a bookmark with the button at the top with the yellow star
The current text of the search bar get's saved
Click on a bookmark to fill the search bar again
Press 'Strg F' to select the search bar and start typing
Consider reading a good book like
If you can read German, look at the author's time management summaries in his bachelor thesis
All changes are saved immediately to the hard drive
Currently, undo works for this database only. A bugfix is coming.
